section.section: If the Director considers compromise to be in the best interest of the Fund, the Director may compromise the amount of a judgment against an employer under this subtitle.
A compromise under paragraph (1) is not required to be approved by any other State official to be effective.

text.section: A compromise under this section may not reduce the amount of benefits payable to or for a covered employee or the dependents of a covered employee.
A judgment may be modified to reflect a compromise under this section.
